title: Information Fighter - Retro Beat-'em-up Game
description: A light-hearted, ironic 1980s arcade brawler (Double Dragon vibe). Single HTML file with Phaser 3, runtime-generated pixel art, WebAudio chiptune. ~3-4 min playtime per run. Side-scrolling lane-based combat with 5-7 enemy waves + boss fight.

title: HTML scaffold, Phaser 3 config, and pixel scaling setup
description: Create single index.html with Phaser 3 CDN, 320x180 internal resolution with crisp pixel scaling. Include top-of-file CONFIG section with runDurationSeconds, waveSchedule, enemyNames, bossLinesParody, bossLinesOptionalRealQuotes.

title: Player character: movement, animation, and combat system
description: Implement Fact-Checker player: WASD/Arrow movement, jump (K), attack (J: tap=punch, tap-tap=combo, hold=charged hit), block (L/Shift). Side-scrolling lane movement with slight up/down depth. Runtime-generated pixel sprite with clipboard/magnifying glass motif.

title: Four enemy archetypes with distinct gimmicks
description: Implement 4 enemy types with runtime pixel sprites and logo-head placeholders: (1) Tabloid Bruiser: rush+grab, (2) Opinion Columnist: mid-range shove + hot-take speech bubble stun, (3) Cable Shouter: ranged talking-point projectile, (4) Astroturf Lobbyist: spawns doubt cloud reducing player damage. Speech bubble projectiles with text: DOUBT, HOAX, JUST ASKING, BOTH SIDES, SUSPICIOUS.

title: Wave system and camera scrolling stage
description: Implement 5-7 enemy waves from 0:00-2:30 with side-scrolling camera through single stage. Use waveSchedule config array. Mini-break at 2:30 with boss intro.

title: Boss fight: Vladimir Impudent with 2 phases
description: Final boss Vladimir Impudent. Phase 1: slow heavy punches + taunt shout lines every ~8s. Phase 2 (<40% HP): faster, short dash, 3-bubble spread projectiles. Clear telegraphs (wind-up + warning bubble). Shout queue system with pixel speech box. Default parody lines + optional real-quote array.

title: UI/HUD: health bars, timer, score, speech bubbles
description: Health bars for player and enemies/boss, game timer, score counter. Pixelated speech bubbles for projectiles/status effects. Hit sparks, knockback, comedic confetti on perfect combos.

title: WebAudio chiptune music and SFX
description: Simple chiptune background music and SFX using WebAudio API. No external audio files. Punch/hit sounds, enemy defeat, boss intro, win/lose jingles.

title: Title screen, tutorial overlay, and end screens
description: Title screen (press J to start). Tutorial overlay during first 10 seconds showing controls. Win screen: VERIFIED! + stats (combos, bubbles popped, myths bonked). Lose screen: MISLED… TRY AGAIN + restart.

title: Create GitHub repo and push final code
description: Create GitHub repo under personal account, commit all code, push to main. Final polish pass on code comments and CONFIG section.

title: Graphics upgrade, kick attack, and boss portrait
description: 16-bit graphics upgrade, jump-kick attack mechanic, and photorealistic Putin head on boss sprite.

title: Upgrade all graphics to 16-bit style
description: Replace current NES 8-bit pixel art with 16-bit SNES/Genesis era style. Larger, more detailed sprites with more colours, smoother shading, better proportions. Richer backgrounds with more detail and gradient work. Think Streets of Rage 2 / Final Fight quality.

title: Jump attack = kick, standing/moving = punch
description: Differentiate attack animations by state: standing attack is a punch, moving attack is a punch, but jumping attack is a kick (extended leg). Visual and hitbox differences for each.

title: Boss head: photorealistic Putin portrait
description: Replace the boss pixel head with a real photorealistic image of Vladimir Putin's head. Source: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Vladimir_Putin_close-up_%28cropped%29.jpg — Load as an image and composite onto the boss body sprite.

title: Change title to Disinformation Fighter
description: Change the title on the title screen to this, and ensure it appears at the top of the playing screen

title: Visual & Gameplay Overhaul - Double Dragon Style
description: Upgrade Information Fighter with NES Double Dragon aesthetics, music, visible enemy logos, and compressed 60s-to-boss pacing.

title: NES 8-bit Double Dragon visual overhaul
description: Rework all runtime-generated sprites and backgrounds to match classic NES Double Dragon aesthetic: chunky 8-bit character sprites with proper body proportions, limited NES palette, scrolling urban street backgrounds with brick walls/dumpsters/signs, proper shadow and depth. Player should look like a beat-em-up protagonist. Enemies should have distinct body types matching their archetype.

title: Double Dragon-style chiptune music
description: Replace the current simple chiptune loop with music that closely resembles the original Double Dragon NES soundtrack style - driving bass, energetic melody, proper NES channel simulation (2 pulse, 1 triangle, 1 noise). Include a distinct boss fight track.

title: Visible embedded logo images on enemy heads
description: Add clearly visible logo/branding on enemy heads. These should be embedded image data (base64 or drawn), not 8-bit style - they should be readable text logos for each outlet: Daily Tattler, The Austeralian, Faux News AU, Advance Aus. The logos should be prominently displayed above or on the enemy sprites.

title: Compress game to 60s before boss fight
description: Reduce the pre-boss gameplay to approximately 60 seconds. Compress wave schedule so all 5-7 waves fit within 60s. Boss intro at ~60s, boss fight from ~65s onward. Update CONFIG.runDurationSeconds. The final boss is Vladimir Impudent (Putin parody) - make the boss sprite more visually distinctive.
